changes: Added spinner for bilateral comparison process
Enhanced error handling with spinner failure method

patterns_discovered: Explicit error and success state management
gotchas_discovered: Need to handle both success and failure scenarios in long-running operations
Importance of providing visual feedback during processing

approach_outcome.description: Added spinner to handleCompare() for bilateral comparison
key_improvements: Enhanced user experience with progress indication

recommendations: Consider extracting spinner logic into a reusable utility function
Add more granular error details in spinner failure messages
Implement consistent spinner usage across similar long-running operations
